HomePage.description: Welcome! I'm a Web Developer with more than two years of professional experience working on agile collaborative teams. I specialize in building web applications using React and TypeScript.

Portfolio.newsDescription: A web app that shows the latest news related to space! This app consists of a Nextjs Frontend and Backend, that relies on a MongoDB Database and a Vercel cron job. It updates the news twice a day by consuming the News API.
Portfolio.SttoriaDescription: Elegant landing page of the Sttoria Photography Studio. Showcasing their services with a bento-style image gallery and a minimalistic video player.
Portfolio.taskManagerDescription: A useful task app that consists of a Kanban Board-like layout. It allows CRUD operations, multiple filtering, pagination, and Google login.
Portfolio.twilioTitle: Full Stack Developer at Twilio (2 years)
Portfolio.twilioDescription: As a consultant, I participated in the Django to Nextjs migration of the documentation site. I created new React components following the best practices in terms of TDD, SEO, accessibility, responsiveness and performance. Additionally, I led the QA process to verify the correct functioning of the new pages.
Portfolio.jelouDescription: Successfully added support for the uploading of elements such as PDFs and multimedia in the HSM (High Structure Message) template input form. Integrated the new Landing page's design in Nextjs.
